name: MVC
description: The Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture is important for software development because it separates an application's data, user interface, and control logic into distinct components.

name: Sequelize
description: Sequelize is a valuable tool for Node.js developers because it provides an Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) layer that abstracts away the need to write SQL queries.

name: How to Use Handlebars.js
description: To use Handlebars.js, create a Handlebars template with placeholders for data, compile it into a JavaScript function, and use that function to render the data onto the HTML page.
